text: Clifton is a former village and historic manor, which now forms part of the south western suburbs of the city of Nottingham, Nottinghamshire, England, United Kingdom. ==Notable people== * Jake Bugg, musician * Karl Collins, actor * Samantha Morton, actress * Jayne Torvill, ice skater, Olympic gold medalist * Viv Anderson, footballer * Darren Huckerby, footballer * Jermaine Jenas, footballer, pundit * Alan Higgott, football manager extraordinaire Category:Settlements in Nottinghamshire Category:Nottingham
title: Clifton, Nottinghamshire
